NomaiObject:
1 <color=lightblue>Enji</color>: ...
2 1 I got complacent having immunity to <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color>. ,
3 2 I was in a rush to get things done. I didn't take proper precautions. I didn't know how long I'd have before my clan showed up to reprimand me for roughing it on my own. ,
4 3 Now, I'm... I'm not even sure they're going to even be able to find me.
5 4 To get this close... and to fail because I was on my own.
6 5 Perhaps they were right. Maybe solar systems shouldn't be put on rails.
7 6 ...
8 7 Hypothesis... confirmed.
